actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the use of facilities at the Owyhee Indian Hospital of the Duck Valley Indian Reservation to provide certain medical care to non-Indians.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of facilities at the Owyhee Indian Hospital of the Duck Valley Indian Reservation in Nevada to provide non-emergency medical care on a fee-for-service basis to non-Indians.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the use of facilities at the Owyhee Indian Hospital of the Duck Valley Indian Reservation to provide certain medical care to non-Indians.
